snippet: It was welcome news when the Texas Department of Transportation found an extra $2 billion, but the discovery reignited frustration over the agency’s past accounting procedures.
lead_paragraph: It was welcome news when the Texas Department of Transportation found an extra $2 billion, but the discovery reignited frustration over the agency’s past accounting procedures.

headline.seo: Texas Transportation Department Deals With the Downside of Finding $2 Billion
headline.main: The Trouble With Finding an Extra $2 Billion
headline.print_headline: The Trouble With Finding An Extra $2 Billion
